title: Currently Learning
blurb: Recently, I decided to learn countries and their capitals. I began with Africa and worked through South America, Asia, Europe, &c. I used various online quiz programs to challenge and drill myself
No special reason for this: simply an awareness that I didn't know much geography and that this would be good general knowledge to have in my brain.
After learning the countries and capitals, I went to work on recognizing the country flags.
